Ele.me and Baidu Deliveries Merge to Consolidate China’s O2O Market $BABA $BIDU http://www.alizila.com/ele-me-baidu-deliveries-merge-in-bid-for-consolidation/

links.description: Chinese online food-delivery company Ele.me said Thursday it's merging with Baidu Deliveries to consolidate the country's intensely competitive online-to-offline (O2O) market. The deal combines Shanghai-based Ele.me, which last year received a $1.25 billion investment from Alibaba Group and affiliate company Ant Financial, and its 1.3 million merchants in 2,000 cities, with the 1 million merchants in 300 cities selling through Baidu Deliveries, a division of internet-search company, Baidu Inc.
links.title: Ele.me, Baidu Deliveries Merge to Consolidate China's O2O Market | Alizila.com
